description: The NPU segment allows the updating of census (bed status) data without sending patient-specific data. An example might include changing the status of a bed from “housekeeping” to “unoccupied.”

1.name: Bed Location
1.description: This field contains the bed location that is a valid bed location

2.name: Bed Status
2.description: This field contains the bed status. Refer to user-defined table 0116 - Bed status for suggested values
2.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables
